review: I really felt heard and  understood by Dr Shernaz who took time to address all my concerns. She is very dedicated towards her work and treats her patients with utmost care.

She is one of the kindest realistic individuals I had the fortunate opportunity of meeting and a wonderful person. I highly recommend Dr. Shernaz  madam for a positive turnover in any health and welfare issues.

review: I felt really positive vibes when i met the Dr Shernaz, she is friendly and really connect and available for the patient.

I was nervous about visiting a gynecologist at my age, but the Dr Shernaz and her staff made me feel so comfortable and at ease. They treated me like family and gave me the advice I needed. I would definitely recommend her to anyone who is visiting a gynecologist for the first time.
Dr Shernaz is a genuine person she truly made each visit a positive and reassuring experience it was wonderful being there and she  also make sure her patients go with positive feeling.
